ðŸ“– Summary: Index is an open-source browser agent that autonomously performs complex web tasks, turning websites into accessible APIs. It leverages LLMs with vision capabilities and supports structured output via Pydantic schemas. Index offers both a serverless API and an interactive CLI for seamless integration and usage.
